data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Sălaj, Romania to the gospel today.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sălaj, Romania
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, of the 183,297 people in the state of Sălaj who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 15 lost neighbors

data.prayer: the state of Sălaj has (about) 13,286 people who know Jesus, 183,297 people who know about him culturally, and 13,317 people who are far from Jesus.
Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Sălaj.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the South Asian, general people.
Spirit, encourage every one of the 13,286 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Sălaj with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Sălaj to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.
